text: Wow, it's amazing to see how far we've come in preventing measles deaths! 🙌 Thanks to the efforts of countries, WHO, the Measles & Rubella Partnership, and other international partners, an estimated 57 million lives have been saved between 2000-2022. 💪🏼But let's not get complacent! 🙅‍♂️ Routine vaccination and mass immunization campaigns are still crucial in reducing global measles deaths. 💉Did you know that in 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine? 🤯 And about 83% of the world's children received one dose by their first birthday! 🎉Let's keep up the good work and make sure every child has access to this life-saving vaccine! 🌎
